datafield.subfield: Manilius ; edited and translated by G.P. Goold.
Latin with English translation on opposite pages.
Includes bibliographical references (p. cxiii-cxxiii) and index.

The world of Manilius (map) -- Preface -- Introduction -- About the poet -- A guide to the poem -- The manuscripts -- Editorial principles -- Bibliography (with Addendum) -- The Astronomica of Marcus Manilius -- Book one -- Book two -- Book three -- Book four -- Book five -- Index -- The skies of Manilius (star-charts).

Astronomica, a Latin didactic poem in five books, begins with an account of celestial phenomena, and then proceeds to treat of the signs of the zodiac and the twelve temples; there follow instructions for calculating the horoscoping degree, and details of chronocrators, decans, injurious degrees, zodiacal geography, paranatellonta, and other technical matters. Besides exhibiting great virtuosity in rendering mathematical tables and diagrams in verse form, the poet writes with some passion about his Stoic beliefs and shows much wit and humour in his character sketches of persons born under particular stars. Perhaps taking a lead from Virgil in his Georgics, Manilius abandons the proportions of his last book to narrate the story of Perseus and Andromeda at considerable length. In spite of its undoubted elegance, the Astronomica is a difficult work, and this edition provides in addition to the first English prose translation a full guide to the poem, with copious explanatory notes and illustrative figures.-- jacket

北京市文物研究所编著.
北京文物与考古系列丛书
亦庄X11号地位于北京市大兴区亦庄镇西四号村一带的凉水河南岸, 本考古报告包括汉墓32座、窑址7座；唐墓1座；辽金墓5座、窑址1座；清墓3座、井1眼。同时并伴随出土有大量随葬器物。这批墓葬的发掘对研究北京东南部地区汉至辽金时期的葬俗、人口分析、制陶产业模式等有极为重大的意义。

datafield.subfield: Chengdu shang ye jie chuan guan zang /
Chengdu wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo bian zhu.

Ben shu zhan xian le de Chengdu chuan guan zang de feng fu kao gu zi liao, zai Gu shu wen hua de yan jiu zhong huan jie da le liang ge da wen ti, qi yi shi you guan Shu ren de zu yuan wen ti, qi er shi guan yu ti qi gong yi zai Chengdu kan shi fa da qi lai de shi jian wen ti. Chengdu Shi shang ye jie gu shu wang zu dan xing chuan guan he zang mu de fa xian, yi qi zhong yao de li shi, wen hua, ke xu he yi shu jie zhi, cheng wei Ba Shu qing tong wen hua zhong bu ke huo qu , cui can xuan li de yi ye.
Abstracts also in English and Japanese.
Chengdu wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo
成都文物考古研究所编著.
本书展现了的成都船棺葬的丰富考古资料, 在古蜀文化的研究中还新解答了两个大问题, 其一是有关蜀人的族源问题其, 二是关于漆器工艺在成都开始发达起来的时间问题. 成都市商业街古蜀王族大型船棺合葬墓的发现, 以其重要的历史, 文化, 科学和艺术价值, 成为巴蜀青铜文化中不可或缺, 璀璨绚丽的一页.

datafield.subfield: Xin hua shu dian jing xiao,

Zhe bu shu zhi jie qu cai yu tian ye kao gu da liang yuan shi zi liao, dan tong kao gu bao gao fa biao de yuan xing you hen da bu tong. Yuan bao gao cha tu, shuo ming, bian zhu zhe sui da dou jin li yao qiu jie jin shi wu, shi ji shang duo nan yu chao chu dui qi te zheng de jian dan miao shu,. Ben shu zuo zhe zhe shi ba ta men zuo wei dang shi de gong yi mei shu pin jing xing zhuan ye xing de guan cha fen xi hou, an zhao zi ji de ren shi, li jie er chong hui de, ke neng bi yuan bao gao cha tu geng jie jin zhen shi--yi shu de zhen shi. Quan shu fen fei yan jiu pian, tu pu pian, jie shuo pian he zi liao pian si da bu fen.
这部书直接取材于田野考古大量原始资料，但同考古报告发表的原型有很大不同，原报告插图、说明，编著者虽大都尽力要求接近实物，实际上多难于超出对其特征的简单描述。本书作者则是把它们作为当时的工艺美术品进行专业性的观察分析后，按照自己的认识、理解而重绘的，可能比原报告插图更接近真实--艺术的真实. 全书分为研究篇, 图谱篇, 解说篇和资料篇四大部分.

datafield.subfield: Zhongguo gu tao ci tu dian /
"Zhongguo gu tao ci tu dian" bian ji wei yuan hui bian ; zhu bian Feng Xianming ; fu zhu bian Geng Baochang, Yang Gen.

Ben shu suo shou ci mu fan wei, wei zhongguo gu dai zhi jin dai nei sheng cha de tao ci qi ji qi chuan tong shao zao gong yi, bu bao kuo yu wai chan pin he xian dai tao ci gong yi. Ben shu gong fei jiu da lei: yi, lei bie, er, qi xing, san, you cai, si, wen shi, wu, yao kou, liu, kuan shi, qi, gong yi ji shu, ba, que xian, xiu fu yu zuo wei, jiu, ren wu. Quan shu shou ci jin 2000 tiao, gong pei cai se zhao pian he xian tu jin 500 fu.
"Zhongguo gu tao ci tu dian" bian ji wei yuan hui
《中国古陶瓷图典》编辑委员会编 ; 主编冯先铭 ; 副主编耿宝昌, 杨根．
本书所收词目范围， 为中国古代至近代境内生产的陶瓷器及其传统烧造工艺，不包括域外产品和现代陶瓷工艺。本书共分九大类：一、类别，二、器形，三、釉彩，四、纹饰，五、窑口，六、款识，七、工艺技术，八、缺陷、修复与作伪，九、人物。全书收词近2000条，共配彩色照片和线图近500幅。
《中国古陶瓷图典》编辑委员会.

Gai shu hui ji le dang shi xue shu jie zai Zengpiyan yi zhi yan jiu fang mian bi jiao you dai biao xing de xue shu guan dian. Guiling Zengpiyan shi zhu ming de xin shi qi shi dai yi zhi. Ben shu wei gai yi zhi de fa jue bao gao, hui ji le 1973-2001 nian kao gu fa jue de quan bo zi liao, xi duo xue ke he zuo de jie jin. Ben shu de chu ban dui yan jiu dao zuo de qi yuan, xin shi qi shi dai shou gong yi, yuan shi xu mu ye deng jun you zhong da yi yi.
Zhongguo she hui ke xue yuan.
中国社会科学院考古硏究所 ... [et al.] 编.
中国田野考古报告集. 考古学专刊. 丁种 ;
该书汇集了当时学术界在甑皮岩遗址研究方面比较有代表性的学术观点。桂林甑皮岩是著名的新石器时代遗址。本书为该遗址的发掘报告，汇集了1973-2001年考古发掘的全部资料，系多学科合作的结晶。本书的出版对研究稻作的起源、新石器时代手工艺、原始畜牧业等均有重大意义。
Zhongguo tian ye kao gu bao gao ji.

辽宁海城史前洞穴遗址综合研究
本书介绍了辽宁省海城县小孤山洞穴遗址的发掘与研究情况, 公布了以往发掘获得的珍贵石器, 骨器材料, 并从地层学, 年代学, 古动物学以及全新世的遗存和古人类学等各个方面, 对该遗址进行了详细的分析与研究.

yi fen gong gong kao gu xue bao gao /
zhu bian Chen Xiejun, Wang Weilin.
Yi fen gong gong kao gu xue bao gao
Beijing da xue chu ban she,

Ben kao gu bao gao miao shu de Hancheng Liaodai Cun liang Zhou gu mu qun yi qi gui mo da, ji bie jiao gao, bu ju wan zhen, bao cun jiao hao zhu cheng, qi feng fu de qing tong, yu qi, jin yin qi ji mu zang yi cun fa xian tian bu le duo xiang kao gu kong bai, ju you zhong yao de yan jiu jia zhi, bi ping wei "2005 nian quan guo shi da kao gu xin fa xian" zhi yi. Ben shu jie du le gai yi zhi de fa jue jian bao, quan mian jie shao le chu to de qing tong qi, jin qi, yu qi, yue qi deng, jin er shen ru tan tao le kao gu xue shi ye xia de Xi Zhou li shi.
主编陈燮君, 王炜林.
本考古报告描述的韩城梁带村两周古墓群以其规模较大, 级别较高, 布局完整, 保存较好著称, 其丰富的青铜, 玉器, 金银器及墓葬遗存发现填补了多项考古空白, 具有重要的研究价值, 被评为"2005年全国十大考古新发现"之一. 本书解读了该遗址的发掘简报, 全面介绍了出土的青铜器, 金器, 玉器, 乐器等, 进而深入探讨了考古学视野下的西周历史.

datafield.subfield: Zhong yuan gu dai wen ming zhi guang /
Henan bo wu yuan bian zhu.
Ancient civilization of the central plains

Ben shu shi Henan bo wu yuan dui yu da xing ji ben chen lie "Zhong yuan gu dai wen ming zhi guang" ji ben cai liao de hui bian, li zu yu kao gu fa jue cheng guo he Henan bo wu yuan te se cang pin, xi tong zhan shi le zuo wei Zhonghua wen ming yuan tou yu he xin de Zhongyua di qu de li shi yu wen ming shi, ju you zhong yao ke pu jia zhi he yi ding de xue shu yi yi.
本书是河南博物院对于大型基本陈列《中原古代文明之光》基本材料的汇编, 立足于考古发掘成果和河南博物院特色藏品, 系统展示了作为中华文明源头与核心的中原地区的历史与文明史, 具有重要科普价值和一定的学术意义.

新石器时代遗址2004-2006年考古发掘报告 /
陕西省考古研究院编著.
新石器时代遗址2004-2006年考古发掘报告
陕西省考古研究院田野考古报告 ;
本书是对西安米家崖遗址2004-2006年考古发掘成果的系统公布.书中客观而详尽介绍了遗址发掘所获新石器时代的遗迹, 遗物, 并依据遗迹间的层位关系及文化面貌差异, 将所获遗存划分为三个发展阶段, 各阶段分别归属于半坡四期文化, 庙底沟二期文化及客省庄文化.另外, 书中亦对遗址中灰坑出土人骨进行了体质人类学方面的研究.本书对了解关中地区史前文化提供了一批十分重要的资料.
陕西省考古研究院 (Xi'an Shi, China)

春秋城址与周围遗址考古报告.
本书对五里界城及周围遗址、鄂王城、草王嘴城的考古资料进行了全面报道，为探讨大冶五里界城与周围遗址、城址的关系，探索楚文化进入鄂东南之前的考古学文化面貌和楚文化在鄂东南的历史进程与特征提供了较为系统的资料。

Kao gu Huang He san bu qu ;

Ben shu shi yi bu yan jiu kao gu xue wen hua de zhuan zhu. Zuo zhe zai Huangtu Gaoyuan shi qian shi shang jie qu "Yangshao wan qi" de pou mian, ran hou gou jian le zhe ge pao mian shang xiang guan kao gu xue yi cun de shi kong guang xie he wen hua guan xi, ye jiu shi fu yuan li shi xiang xiang (di yi zhang zhi di si zhang), ran hou dui li shi xian xiang zuo chu yin guo guan xi de jie shi (di wu zhang), you ci ti xian chu zuo zhe de li shi guan he fang fa lun.
黄土高原仰韶晚期遗存的谱系 /
本书是一部研究考古学文化的专著. 作者在黄土高原的史前史上截取"仰韶晚期"的剖面, 然后构建了这个剖面上相关考古学遗存的时空关系和文化关系, 也就是复原历史现象(第一章至第四章), 而后对历史现象作出因果关系的解释(第五章), 由此体现出作者的历史观和方法论.
Kao gu Huang He san bu qu ;

datafield.subfield: Lugu Jin dai Lü shi jia zu mu zang fa jue bao gao /
Beijing Shi wen wu yan jiu suo bian zhu.
Beijing wen wu yu kao gu xi lie cong shu

Ben shu wei 2007 nian Beijing Shi Shijingshan Qu Lu Gu Jin dai Lü shi jia zu mu di ji Qing dai mu zang de kau gu fa jue bao gao. Fa jue zong mian ji yue wei 1240 ping fang mi, gong qing li le gu dai mu zang 62 zuo, qi zhong Jin dai mu zang 10 zuo, Qing dai mu zang 52 zuo. Chu tu wan zheng huo ke fu yuan de tao qi, gong qi, tie qi, jin qi, yin qi, gu qi, ci qi, liao qi deng gong ji 200 yu jian (zu), ji bu tong shi qi de tong qian 100 yu mei. Jin dai mu zang wei shu xue tong kuang shi chun mu, jun wei huo zang, chu tu le 7 jian jing mei de ci qi, bing fa xiang mu zhi liang he. Ju mu zhi ji zai, Lugu di qu wei Liao Jin shi qi Yan di han ren da zu--Lü shi ji zu de mu di. Ci chu mu di de fa xian wei liao jie, yan jiu Beijing Diqu Liao Jin shi qi de li shi, she hui, zheng zhi, xi su deng fang mian de qing kuang you zhe jie wei zhong yao de jia zhi.
Beijing Shi wen wu yan jiu suo
鲁谷金代吕氏家族墓葬发掘报告 /
北京市文物研究所编著.
北京文物与考古系列丛书

本书为2007年北京市石景山区鲁谷金代吕氏家族墓地及清代墓葬的考古发掘报告. 发掘总面积约为1240平方米, 共清理了古代墓葬62座, 其中金代墓葬10座、清代墓葬52座. 出土完整或可复原的陶器、铜器、铁器、金器、银器、骨器、瓷器、料器等共计200余件（组）, 及不同时期的铜钱100余枚. 金代墓葬为竖穴土圹石椁墓, 均为火葬, 出土了7件精美的瓷器, 并发现墓志两合. 据墓志记载, 鲁谷地区为辽金时期燕地汉人大族--吕氏家族的墓地. 此处墓地的发现为了解、研究北京地区辽金时期的历史、社会、政治、习俗等方面的情况有着极为重要的价值.

datafield.subfield: L'art oublié des lapidaires de la Bactriane aux époques achéménide et hellénistique /

La Bactriane, importante région de l'Asie centrale antique, s'étendait sur le nord de l'Afghanistan et le sud de l'Ouzbékistan et du Tadjikistan. Elle fut colonisée par l'empire perse achéménide et devint le siège de monarchies grecques après la conquête d'Alexandre le Grand, mais resta au contact du monde des nomades scythes des steppes. D'intenses recherches de la part d'équipes archéologiques, notamment françaises comme à Aï Khanoum, ont mis au jour les vestiges de ces cultures et de leurs arts. La vision des arts qui en émerge, faite des apports exogènes achéménides, grecs et nomades, peut aujourd'hui être complétée par la mise en évidence d'un fonds local centrasiatique, d'origine très ancienne. Le présent ouvrage s'attache à repérer les traces de cette tradition autochtone dans les productions d'un art vernaculaire original, celui des graveurs de pierre, principalement de sceaux et de couvercles de pyxides. -- Page 4 of cover.

datafield.subfield: Tang Wu dai xi bei fang yin /
Zhonghua xian dai xue shu ming zhu cong shu

Ben shu zuo zhe xi han dai yan yu fang yan xue dian ji ren zhi yi. Gai shu suo yong cai liao you "Qian zi wen", "Jin gang jing", "A mi tuo jing", "Da cheng zhong zong jian jie", "Kai meng yao xun", cong Dunhuang Han Zang dui yin xie ben zhong suo kui jian zhi Tang Wei dai fang yin yu xie bei fang yin de bi jiao, "Tang Bo hui meng bei" zhong zhi Han Zang dui yin.
中华现代学术名著丛书
本书作者系现代汉语方言学奠基人之一. 该书所用材料有"千字文","金刚经","阿弥陀经","大乘中宗见解","开蒙要训", 从敦煌汉藏对音写本中所窥见之唐五代西北方音, 从"开蒙要训"的注音中所窥见的五代敦煌方音, 唐五代西北方音与现代西北方音的比较,"唐蕃会盟碑"中之汉藏对音.
Zhonghua xian dai xue shu ming zhu cong shu.
中华现代学术名著丛书.

Ben shu gong fen shi ge bu fen, wei rao yin shi wen lun shu bei fang you mu min zu yin shi wen hua de ding wei, yi ji yu sheng tai huan jing, sheng ji fang shi, zheng ce jun lue, wen sheng bao jian, she hui gong neng, yi shu chuang zuo deng fang mian de guan xi, bing dui yin shi wen hua jiao liu, yin shi wen hua ceng ci xing, yin shi lun li deng fang mian de nei han jing xing le lun shu.
Zhongguo bei fang you mu min zu yin shi wen hua yan jiu.
Beijing : Wen wu chu ban she, 2008
中国北方游牧民族饮食文化研究 /
本书共分十个部分，围绕饮食论述北方游牧民族饮食文化的定位，以及与生态环境、生计方式、政策军略、卫生保健、社会功能、艺术创作等方面的关系，并对饮食文化交流、饮食文化层次性、饮食理论等方面的内涵进行了论述。
Kao gu xin shi ye cong shu

datafield.subfield: Pizhou Shantou Dong Han mu di /
Nanjing bo wu guan, Pizhou bo wu guan bian zhu.
Shantou cemetery of Eastern Han dynasty in Pizhou
Nan shui bei diao dong xian gong cheng wen wu bao hu xiang mu. Jiangsu Sheng kao gu fa jue bao gao =
Reports on the cultural relics conservation in the south-to-north water diversion project Jiangsu ;

Pizhou Shantou mu di gong jie shi Dong Han mu zang 45 zuo, mu di wai wei fa xian you da xing huang hao, dong nan jiao you chu kou, zai mu di de nan bo fan xian you hong shao tu ji si yi ji, ji ben wang zheng de jie si le Shantou Dong Han mu di de quan mao. Mu zang nei gong chu tu le lu you tao qi, ci qi, yin qi, tong qi, tie qi, shi qi deng wen wu gong 240 duo jian. Shantou mu di de fa jue dui yan jiu Dong Han shi qi, Xuzhou Diqu de she hui fa zhan qing kuang, sheng chan li shui ping, jing ji sheng huo yi ji mai zang xi su ju you zhong yao yi yi.
南京博物馆，邳州博物馆 编著.
南水北调东线工程文物保护项目. 江苏省考古发掘报告 =
Reports on the cultural relics conservation in the south-to-north water dversion project Jiangsu ;
邳州山头墓地共揭示东汉墓葬45座, 墓地外围发现有大型隍壕, 东南角有出口, 在墓地的南部发现有红烧土祭祀遗迹, 基本完整地揭示了山头东汉墓地的全貌. 墓葬内共出土了绿釉陶器、瓷器、银器、铜器、铁器、石器等文物共240多件. 山头墓地的发掘对研究东汉时期, 徐州地区的社会发展情况、生产力水平、经济生活以及埋葬习俗具有重要意义.
Nan shui bei diao dong xian gong cheng wen wu bao hu xiang mu.
Jiangsu sheng kao gu fa jue bao gao ;
南水北调东线工程文物保护项目.

Ben shu fen bie cong xing bie yu nian ling, gu ge fa yu cheng du, shi pu jie gou, ren zhong ti zhi te zheng he ren zhong de duo yuan tong ji fen xi deng duo ge jiao du dui Nei Mengu Helingger Xian Tuchengzi yi zhi Zhangguo wan qi ju min de gu ge biao ben jing xing le ti zhi ren lei xue de quan mian kao cha; jing er cong ti zhi ren lei xue jiao du que ding le Tuchengzi gu dai ju min ke neng shi Zhao guo zhu shou bian sai de shi bing, bing yi ci wei qie ru dian dui Nei Menggu zhong nan bu di qu xian Qin shi qu de "Go zhong yuan lei xing" de ju min de ren zhong di li fen bu qing kuang zuo le gai kuo xing de gui na he zong jie, ci wai, dui ci lei ju min de zhong xi lai yuan wen ti jing xing tao lun.
内蒙古和林格尔县土城子遗址战国时期人骨研究 /
吉林大学边疆考古研究中心系列学术著作
本书分别从性别与年龄特征, 骨骼的发育程度, 食谱结构, 人种体质特征和人种的多元统计分析等多个角度对内蒙古和林格尔县土城子遗址战国晚期居民的骨骼标本进行了体质人类学的全面考察; 进而从体质人类学角度确定了土城子古代居民很可能是赵国驻守边塞的士兵, 并以此为切入点对内蒙古中南部地区先秦时期的"古中原类型"居民的人种地理分布情况作了概括性的归纳和总结. 此外, 对此类居民的种系来源问题进行了讨论.
Jilin da xue bian jiang kao gu yan jiu zhong xin xi lie xue shu zhu zuo.
吉林大学边疆考古研究中心系列学术著作.

中国东北地区夏至战国时期的考古学文化研究 /
吉林大学边疆考古研究中心系列学术著作
本书从单个遗址和墓地的分组, 到多个遗址和墓地的分段, 再到整个考古学文化的分期, 最后到诸多考古学文化的编年序列等几个不同层面的研究入手, 分别建立了东北嫩江流域, 辽西山地, 辽西平原, 辽东南部, 辽东北部, 第二松花江流域, 图们江流域7个自然地理区域内夏至战国时期考古学文化的编年坐标, 经过横向对比和整合研究, 划分出了夏至早商, 商代晚期, 西周至春秋, 战国4个大的历史发展阶段.
Jilin da xue bian jiang kao gu yan jiu zhong xin xi lie xue shu zhu zuo.
吉林大学边疆考古研究中心系列学术著作.

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: Zhongguo Dongbei di qu shi peng yan jiu /
Jilin da xue bian jiang kao gu yan jiu zhong xin xi lie xue shu zhu zuo

Ben shu zong jie le shi peng yi ci cong su cheng dao shu yu nei han zhu jian yan bian de guo cheng, dui shi peng shu yu jing xing le jie ding, ming que le shi peng yan jiu de dui xiang, jing guo dui shi peng jie gou de xiang xi fen xi, can zhao mu qian zhi shi mu fen lei yan jiu de cheng guo, jian li le shi peng yan jiu de kuang jia ti xi, dui zheng ge Zhongguo Dongbei bu di qu ge lei shi peng mu zang de shu liang, fen bu zhuang tai, xing zhi yan bian, wen hua nei han, shi kong guan xi deng wen ti jing xing le tan tao.
中国东北地区石棚研究 /
吉林大学边疆考古研究中心系列学术著作
本书总结了石鹏一词从俗称到术语内涵逐渐演变的过程，对石鹏术语进行了界定，明确了石鹏研究的对象，经过对石鹏结构的详细分析，参照目前支石墓分类研究的成果，建立了石鹏研究的框架体系，对整个中国东北部地区各类石鹏墓葬的数量、分布状态、形制演变、文化内涵、时空关系等问题进行了探讨。
Jilin da xue bian jiang kao gu yan jiu zhong xin xi lie xue shu zhu zuo.
吉林大学边疆考古研究中心系列学术著作.

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: Nei Menggu Helinge'er Xian Xindianzi mu di ren gu yan jiu /
Research on the skeletons of Xindianzi Graveyard, Helinge'er County, Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region
Jilin da xue bian jiang kao gu yan jiu zhong xin xi lie xue shu zhu zuo

Ben shu cong xing bie yu nian ling, gu ge fa yu cheng du, shi pu, ren zhong te zhedng deng duo ge jiao du dui Xindianzi Dong Zhou shi ju min de gu ge biao ben jing xing le quan mian de ti zhi ren lei xue de kao cha. Jing er cong ti zhi ren lei xue jiao du que ding le Xindianzi gu dai ju min wei yi pi nan xia de mu ren. Bing yi ci wei qie ru dian duo Nei Menggu zhong nan bu di qu xian Qin shi qi gu dai ju min ren zhong di li fen bu de dong tai guo cheng zuo le gai kuo xing de gui na he zong jie.
内蒙古和林格尔县新店子墓地人骨研究 /
吉林大学边疆考古研究中心系列学术著作
本书从性别与年龄、骨骼发育程度、食谱、人种特征等多个角度对新店子东周时期居民的骨骼标本进行了全面的体质人类学考察。进而从体质人类学角度确定了新店子古代居民为一批南下的牧人。并以此为切入点对内蒙古中南部地区先秦时期古代居民人种地理分布的动态过程作了概括性的归纳和总结。
Jilin da xue bian jiang kao gu yan jiu zhong xin xi lie xue shu zhu zuo.
吉林大学边疆考古研究中心系列学术著作.

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: Yiwo'erjia cheng zhi he mu di ji xiang guan Xiongnu kao gu wen ti yan jiu /
Jilin da xue bian jiang kao gu yan jiu zhong zhong xin xi lie xue shu zhu zuo

Ben shu gai kuo jie shao le Eluosi Beierjia di qu de liang chu zhong yao de Xiongnu yi cun, fen xi le liang ge shi qi Xiongnu yi cun de qi wu qun de shi dai te zheng. Zai nian dai fen xi de ji chu shang, dui yi Yiwo'erjia yi zhi qun wei dai biao de wai Beierjia di qu Xiongnu yin cun jing xing wen hua yin su fen xi, bing qi dui Zhongguo jing nei de zhu yao Han dai Xiongnu yi cun jing xing le ju ti fen xi.
伊沃尔加城址和墓地及相关匈奴考古问题研究 /
吉林大学边疆考古研究中心系列学术著作
本书概括介绍了俄罗斯外贝加尔地区的两处重要匈奴遗存，分析了两个时期匈奴遗存的器物群的时代特征。在年代分析的基础上，对以伊沃尔加遗址群为代表的外贝加尔地区匈奴遗存进行文化因素分析，并且对中国境内的主要汉代匈奴遗存进行了具体分析。
Jilin da xue bian jiang kao gu yan jiu zhong zhong xin xi lie xue shu zhu zuo.
吉林大学边疆考古研究中心系列学术著作.

Lijiawan yi zhi bao han xin shi qi shi dai yi cun, Zhou dai yi cun, Han-Liu Chao yi cun, Tang Song ji Ming Qing wen hua ci cun deng, qi zhong xin shi qi shi dai Qujialing wen hua yi cun ju you Jianghan Pingyuan dian xing de Qujialing lei xing te zheng, wei Qujialing wen hua fen bu fan wei de kuo da ti gong le xiang shi de zheng ju. 长江三峡工程文物保护项目报告. 乙种 =
Reports on the cultural relics conservation in the Three Gorges Dam Project B (site rept.) ;
本书系统介绍了湖北省巴东县李家湾遗址2001年发掘的田野资料. 李家湾遗址包含新石器时代遗存, 周代遗存, 汉-六朝遗存, 唐宋及明清文化遗存等, 其中新石器时代屈家岭文化遗存具有江汉平原典型的屈家岭类型特征, 为屈家岭文化分布范围的扩大提供了翔实的证据. 同时, 在描述石质生产工具时开创性地提出了一套系统的定位, 观察, 描述方法.

Beijing : Wen wu chu ban she, 2008
本书以宣化张氏家族壁画墓群为中心，讨论契丹统治下汉人墓葬艺术中的多元文化内涵，以期从中了解一些当时常见墓葬装饰内容的功能与意义，解释有关丧葬艺术题材背后的观念与信仰，以及这些艺术形式所赖以产生或演化的特定社会历史根源。

datafield.subfield: Hebei Sheng wen wu yan jiu suo, Luquan Shi wen wu bao guan suo bian zhu.

Ben shu shi Hebei Sheng wen wu yan jiu suo 1991-1994 nian Gaozhuang Han mu de kao gu fa jue bao gao. Ta shi Mancheng Han mu zhi hou fa jue de you yi zuo da xing mu zang, gong chu tu wen wu 7000 yu jian, zhu yao you jia qin, jia chu, liang cang, chu fang yong pin, sheng huo yong tao qi, shi yong che ma he cai hui mu zhi bing ma yong, zhan chuang deng. Jie he ming wen, li shi wen xian tui ce wei Xi Han Chang shan wang Liu Shun mu zang.
Hebei Sheng wen wu yan jiu suo
Luquan Shi wen wu bao guan suo
河北省文物研究所, 鹿泉市文物保管所编著.
本书是河北省文物研究所1991~1994年高庄汉墓的考古发掘报告. 它是满城汉墓之后发掘的又一座大型墓葬, 共出土文物7000余件，主要有家畜，家禽，粮仓，厨房用品，生活用陶器，实用车马和彩绘木质兵马俑，战船等。结合铭文，历史文献推测为西汉常山王刘舜墓葬.

datafield.subfield: This new ed. replaces the previous Loeb classical library ed. of 1968.
Texts in Greek with English translations on facing pages; introductions in English.
First two works translated by E.C. Marchant; third and fourth works translated by O.J. Todd.

Preface -- General introduction -- General bibliography -- Memorabilia -- Oeconomicus -- Symposium -- Apology -- Index to Memorabilia -- Index to Oeconomicus -- Index to Symposium -- Index to Apology.

"Xenophon (ca. 430 to ca. 354 BCE), a member of a wealthy but politically quietist Athenian family and an admirer of Socrates, left Athens in 401 BCE to serve as a mercenary commander for Cyrus the Younger of Persia, then joined the staff of King Agesilaus II of Sparta before settling in Elis and, in the aftermath of the battle of Leuctra in 371 BCE, retiring to Corinth. His historical and biographical works, Socratic dialogues and reminiscences, and short treatises on hunting, horsemanship, economics, and the Spartan constitution are richly informative about his own life and times. This volume collects Xenophon's portrayals of his associate, Socrates. In Memorabilia (or Memoirs of Socrates) and in Oeconomicus, a dialogue about household management, we see the philosopher through Xenophon's eyes. Here, as in the accompanying Symposium, we also obtain insight on life in Athens. The volume concludes with Xenophon's Apology, an interesting complement to Plato's account of Socrates's defense at his trial." -- Publisher website.

The later series of Imagines is called "Posteriores" to distinguish it from the first. In the preface of the present edition, the earlier "Imagines" are ascribed to Philostratus, the Lemnian, son of Nervianus [i.e. Philostratus the Elder]. "His grandson, of the same name, and referred to as Philostratus the Younger, wrote about A.D. 300 a series of Imagines of much the same type as his grandfather's". Cf. Introd., p. xvi.

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: edited by Jason König, Katerina Oikonomopoulou, Greg Woolf.

"The circulation of books was the motor of classical civilisation. But books were both expensive and rare, and so libraries - private and public, royal and civic - played key roles in articulating intellectual life. This collection, written by an international team of scholars, presents a fundamental reassessment of how ancient libraries came into being, how they were organised, and how they were used. Drawing on papyrology and archaeology, and on accounts written by those who read and wrote in them, it presents new research on reading cultures, on book collecting, and on the origins of monumental library buildings. Many of the traditional stories told about ancient libraries are challenged. Few were really enormous, none was designed as a research centre, and occasional conflagrations do not explain the loss of most ancient texts. But the central place of libraries in Greco-Roman culture emerges more clearly than ever"--
Reading the libraries of Assyria and Babylonia /
Fragments of a history of ancient libraries /
part II. Hellenistic and Roman Republican libraries.
Men and books in fourth-century BC Athens /
From text to text : the impact of the Alexandrian library on the work of Hellenistic poets /

datafield.subfield: Aristotle ; edited and translated by Robert Mayhew.
Aristotle's Physical problems arranged according to kind
Physical problems arranged according to kind
Texts in Greek with English translations on facing pages; introductions in English.
Vol. 2 has title: Problems / Aristotle ; edited and translated by Robert Mayhew. Rhetoric to Alexander / edited and translated by David C. Mirhady.

The first work ("Problems") may contain passages written by Aristotle, but he is no longer considered to be the sole author of the work. The second work ("Rhetoric to Alexander") is now attributed to Anaximenes of Lampsacus.

Problems, the third-longest work in the Aristotelian corpus, contains thirty-eight books covering more than 900 problems about living things, meteorology, ethical and intellectual virtues, parts of the human body, and miscellaneous questions. Although Problems is an accretion of multiple authorship over several centuries, it offers a fascinating technical view of Peripatetic method and thought. Rhetoric to Alexander, which provides practical advice to orators, was likely composed during the period of Aristotleʹs tutorship of Alexander, perhaps by Anaximenes, another of Alexanderʹs tutors. Both Problems and Rhetoric to Alexander replace the earlier Loeb edition by Hett and Rackham, with texts and translations incorporating the latest scholarship. -- Book jacket.

datafield.subfield: Henan Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo bian.

Zai Henan Sheng zhong nan bu da ping yuan shang, Haojiatai yi shi shi yi chu nei nan xiang dang fen fu de Longshan wen hua, Erlitou wen hua de zhong yao yi zhi, ci chu yi zhi de he xin shi yi zuo cheng bao yi zhi, zhe zuo cheng bao de fa xian, zheng ming ju jin 4600 nian qian ju zhu zai Shan He liu yu de gu dai ju min, yi jing kai shi gou zhu fang yu gong shi. Haojiatai yi zhi de ba qi wen hua, biao ming gai yi zhi cong Longshan wen hua zao qi ji kai shi zhu ren, jing li le man chang de sui yue, zhi Erlitou wen hua san qi yi hou bei fei qi, xiang zhe yang feng fu de wen hua dui ji shi shi fen shao jian de, zhe dui yu yan jiu Longshan wen hua he Erlitou wen hua shi shi fen zhong yao de zi liao.
Henan Sheng wen wu yan jiu suo
河南省文物考古研究所编.
在河南省中南部大平原上,郝家台遗址是一处内涵相当丰富的龙山文化,二里头文化的重要遗址,这处遗址的核心是一座城堡遗迹,这座城堡的发现,证明距今4600年前居住在沙河流域的古代居民,已经开始构筑防御工事.郝家台遗址的八期文化,表明该遗址从龙山文化早期即开始住人,经历了漫长的岁月,至二里头文化三期以后被废弃,像这样丰富的文化堆积是十分少见的.这对于研究龙山文化和二里头文化是十分重要的资料.
河南省文物考古硏究所.

揭阳考古队, 揭阳市文化广电新闻出版局编.
本书是"古揭阳(榕江)先秦两汉考古学文化综合研究"课题的成果之二, 包括7篇考古报告和9篇研究论文. 考古报告详细地报道了粤东揭阳地区先秦两汉考古的现状. 于是研究论文既有考古学的综合研究, 也探讨了揭阳与周边, 中原地区的文化关系.
揭阳市文化广电新闻出版局.

datafield.subfield: Galen ; edited and translated by Ian Johnston and G.H.R. Horsley.
Text in Greek, with English translation on facing pages; introductory matter in English.
Includes bibliographical references (v. 1, p. cxxxix-cxliv) and indexes.

"Galen of Pergamum (129-?199/216), physician to the court of the emperor Marcus Aurelius, was a philosopher, scientist, and medical historian, a theoretician and practitioner, who wrote forcefully and prolifically on an astonishing range of subjects and whose impact on later eras rivaled that of Aristotle. Galen synthesized the entirety of Greek medicine as a basis for his own doctrines and practice, which comprehensively embraced theory, practical knowledge, experiment, logic, and a deep understanding of human life and society. Method of Medicine, is a systematic and comprehensive account of the principles of treating injury and disease and one of Galen's greatest and most influential works. Enlivening the detailed case studies are many theoretical and polemical discussions, acute social commentary, and personal reflections. The Loeb Method of medicine is in three volumes."--Book jacket.

datafield.subfield: Chuan yue yuan gu yu xian dai /
Gao Xing, Wang Huimin, He Jide zhu bian.
Chuan yue yuan gu yu xian dai
connecting the past to the present

Shuidonggou yi zhi shi wo guo zhu ming de jiu shi qi shi dai wan qi yi zhi. Gai yi zhi fa xiang de shi zhi pin fan ying de ceng jing zai gai yi zhi de shi qian ren lei yu xi fang shi qian ren lei cun zai zhe za jiao he bian yi. Shi yan jiu Dongya Diqu shi qian ren lei sheng huo, yan hua, fa zhan de zhong yao zi liao. Ben shu shi dui yi wang gai yi zhi suo zuo de kao gu gong zuo de hui gu he zong jie, zai zong jie qian ren gong zuo de ji chu shang, hui bao le jin nian de xin de yan jiu cheng guo. Yi ping shi de miao xie he sheng dong de tu pian wei zhu, dui kao gu xue, te bie shi shi qian kao gu xue jing xing le da zhong ke pu.
高星, 王惠民, 贺吉德主编.
水洞沟遗址是我国著名的旧石器时代晚期遗址. 该遗址发现的石制品反映的曾经在该遗址生存的史前人类与西方史前人类存在着杂交和变异. 是研究东亚地区史前人类生活, 演化, 发展的重要资料. 本书是对以往对该遗址所做的考古工作的回顾和总结, 在总结前人工作的基础上, 汇报了近些年新的研究成果. 以平实的描写和生动的图片为主, 对考古学, 特别是史前考古学进行了大众科普.

西拉木伦河流域先秦时期遗址调查与试掘 /
内蒙古自治区文物考古研究所, 吉林大学边疆考古研究中心编著.
西拉木伦河流域地处欧亚大草原东端, 介于农业与游牧业的交错地带. 夏家店上层文化之后, 这里正是牧业文明形成的关键时期, 那么本地区发达的畜牧业抑或游牧业是外来的, 还是原有土地利用方式适从气候环境变迁的转化? 井沟子西区墓葬的发掘将为这一问题的解答提供重要线索, 同时对我国北方地区牧业文明形成机制的探讨也具有理论意义.
内蒙古文物考古研究所.

datafield.subfield: Philostratus ; edited and translated by Jeffrey Rusten, Jason König.

In the writings of Philostratus (ca. 170-ca. 250 CE), the renaissance of Greek literature in the second century CE reached its height. His Life of Apollonius of Tyana, Lives of the Sophists, and Imagines reconceive in different ways Greek religion, philosophy, and art in and for the world of the Roman Empire. In this volume, Heroicus and Gymnasticus, two works of equal creativity and sophistication, together with two brief Discourses (Dialexeis), complete the Loeb edition of his writings. Heroicus is a conversation in a vineyard amid ruins of the Protesilaus shrine (opposite Troy on the Hellespont), between a wise and devout vinedresser and an initially skeptical Phoenician sailor, about the beauty, continuing powers, and worship of the Homeric heroes. With information from his local hero, the vinedresser reveals unknown stories of the Trojan campaign especially featuring Protesilaus and Palamedes, and describes complex, miraculous, and violent rituals in the cults of Achilles. Gymnasticus is the sole surviving ancient treatise on sports. It reshapes conventional ideas about the athletic body and expertise of the athletic trainer and also explores the history of the Olympic Games and other major Greek athletic festivals, portraying them as distinctive venues for the display of knowledge.
Texts in Greek with English translations on facing pages; preface and introductions in English.

zhu bian Zhao Jiabin, Wu Chunming.
Zhongguo shui xia kao gu bao gao xi lie ;

Fujian Liangjiang Dinghaiwan shi gu dai Fuzhou Gang de hai shang men hu he chua nzhi ji nchu Ming Jiang kou ting bo, bu ji de di yi ge di dian, shi gu dai yan hai mao yi de zhong zhuan zhan zhi yi. 1989 nian yi lai, zhong wai hai yang kao gu xue zhe xian hou san ci zai Dinghaiwan hai yu kai zhan le yi xi lie shui xia kao gu diao cha, kan ce yu fa jue gong zuo, fa xian le bai diao yi hao he er hao, Danie zhi Longwengyu, Jinsha deng chen chuan yi zhi, di dian, chu shui Song Yuan, Ming Qing deng bu tong li shi shi qi de ci qi, tie qi, tong qi deng chen chuan wen wu biao ben 4000 duo jian. Dinghaiwan chen chuan kao gu shi wo guo shui xia kao gu shi ye chu chuan qi de yi xiang zhong yao gong zuo, wei wo guo dong nan yan hai gu dai hai yang she hui jing ji shi, zhong wai hai yang jiao tong shi deng yan jiu ti gong le zhong yao de shi wu zi liao. Ben shu nei rong bao kuo Dinghaiwan zi ran yu ren wen bei jing, shui xia kao gu gong zuo.
福建连江定海湾沉船考古 /
主编赵嘉宾, 吴春明.
中国水下考古报告系列 ;

福建连江定海湾是古代福州港的海上门戶和船只进出闽江口停泊, 补给的第一个地点, 是古代沿海贸易的中转站之一.1989年以来, 中外海洋考古学者先后三次在定海湾海域开展了一系列水下考古调查, 勘测与发掘工作, 发现了白礁一号和二号, 大埕渣, 龙翁屿, 金沙等沉船遗址, 地点, 出水宋元, 明, 清等不同历史时期的瓷器, 铁器, 铜器等沉船文物标本4000多件.定海湾沉船考古是我国水下考古事业初创期的一项重要工作, 为我国东南沿海古代海洋社会经济史, 中外海洋交通史等研究提供了重要的实物资料.本书内容包括定海湾自然与人文背景, 水下考古工作.
Zhongguo shui xia kao gu bao gao xi lie
中国水下考古报告系列 ;

涅槃と弥勒の図像学 : インドから中央アジアへ.
从印度到中亚 = Iconology of Parinirvana and Maitreya : from India to Central Asia /
宮治昭著 ; 李萍, 张清涛译 ; 敦煌研究院编.
佛教艺术与敦煌学名著译丛
本研究接受了先行者各种研究的刺激和启迪，试图运用图像解释学的方法，有关涅盘和弥勒的图像特征及其系列的研究, 深入剖析不同地区佛教美术的异同, 探索佛教美术从印度到中亚的传播及变化以及各自的发展道路, 廓清了学术领域的诸多误区.

datafield.subfield: edited by Michael Sebbane, Osnat Misch-Brandl, and Daniel M. Master ; including contributions by Thomas E. Levy ... [et al.].
Institute for the Study of the Ancient World and Princeton University Press ;

Published in conjunction with the exhibition held at the Institute for the Study of the Ancient World, New York University, Feb. 13-June 8, 2014 and the Legion of Honor, Fine arts Museums of San Francisco, June 28, 2014-Jan. 4, 2015.

Focuses on the people of the Southern Levant who harnessed the power of metallurgy during the fourth millennium BCE. Artisans produced extraordinary copper objects while other craftsmen molded pottery and stone into complex anthropomorphic burial containers, statuettes, and ritual objects. Taken together, these artifacts reveal the first stratified culture known in the ancient Near East. Highlights of the exhibition include a selection of material from the Na'al Mishmar hoard, an unprecedented collection of copper prestige and ritual objects, organic materials from the Cave of the Warrior, and an exceptional group of ritual figurines.
Institute for the Study of the Ancient World.
